abstract: Winston-Salem, NC, police charge Jarrett Jerome Moore, former student of  Winston-Salem State University, with murder of Anthony White Jr and possession of a weapon near campus dormitories.
lead_paragraph: A former student was charged Monday with murder in the shooting death of a student near dormitories on the Winston-Salem State University campus, the police said.

headline.main: North Carolina: Man Charged With Campus Murder
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Man Charged With Campus Murder

snippet: A former student was charged Monday with murder in the shooting death of a student near dormitories on the Winston-Salem State University campus, the police said.
